page.title: 19JOHN ANDREW'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content:
6.00am Get up. 6.15am Wash, shave, etc. 6.30am Get dressed. 7.00am Read the paper. 7.30am Have breakfast_ 2 shredded wheat,egg,bacon and toast. 8.15am Leave for work. 9.00am Get to Nancemeer Farm where I work. 12.30pm Leave for work at Tregony. 5.30pm Do the milking - Friesans. 7.30pm Get home. 8.30pm Have steak grill for tea. 9.00pm Watch the news on TV. 9.30pm Have supper (2 shredded wheat) 10.00pm Go to bed.
Martin Andrews is 11. John Andrews is his father. He works on two different farms. Martin has a younger brother Richard. The Andrews family live at Carnon Downs.
